ygData.subject: Re: Qeynos
ygData.msgSnippet: I think bear hide cloak was 5 ac.. I got one made by a NPC outside the entrance to the druid place in qeynos hills, can t remember the NPC name but he was
ygData.messageBody:
I think bear hide cloak was 5 ac.. I got one made by a NPC outside the
entrance to the druid place in qeynos hills, can't remember the NPC name
but he was sitting by the fireplace, you need like 22gp and a high quality
bear hide for him to do it, oh and the correct faction standings, but
you'll find out if he will do it if you talk to him about it, wish I could
remember what to say though..

- Avron -


On Tue, 20 Apr 1999, Whitmore, Lance wrote:

> bear hide boot is AC 5
> bear hide belt is AC 4
>
> bear hide cloak.. i dont know just yet
>
